creator: bniggemyer@covansys.com
text:
In Perforce release 2004.02 "p4 tag" was introduced to streamline the labelling 
process.  Please add an ant task to utilize this feature.  Thanks.

Perforce Ant tasks have been removed in Ant 1.9.0.
Users of Perforce Ant Tasks are advised to use the tasks supplied by Perforce Inc.
creator: antoine@apache.org
